articles.author: Eric Bradner and Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Trump returns to DC for first time since leaving office to make speech at policy summit - CNN
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump will return to Washington on Tuesday for the first time since he left office, delivering a speech at the America First Policy Institute's two-day summit.
articles.content:
(CNN)Former President Donald Trump will return to Washington on Tuesday for the first time since he left office, delivering a speech at the America First Policy Institute's two-day summit.

articles.title: Actor Paul Sorvino, known for roles in Goodfellas, Law & Order, dies at 83 - CBC News
articles.description: In his over 50 years in the entertainment business, Sorvino was a mainstay in films and television, playing an Italian American communist in Warren Beatty's Reds, Henry Kissinger in Oliver Stone's Nixon and mob boss Eddie Valentine in The Rocketeer.
articles.content:
Paul Sorvino, an imposing actor who specialized in playing crooks and cops like Paulie Cicero in Goodfellas and the NYPD sergeant Phil Cerretta on Law & Order, has died. He was 83.
His publicist… [+2835 chars]

articles.author: Will DuPree, Rich Segal
articles.title: VIDEO: Central Texans dazzled by late night fireball sightings - KXAN.com
articles.description: The American Meteor Society (AMS), a nonprofit that tracks meteor astronomy, received at least 219 reports of people seeing the fireball Sunday mostly in Texas, but some even spotted it in states like Oklahoma and Louisiana.
articles.content:
LOCKHART, Texas (KXAN) A bright fireball streaking across the Sunday night sky dazzled Central Texas residents whose home security cameras captured the rare sighting.
